original_text:
Shitrai the Sharonite was in charge of the herds grazing in Sharon.
Shaphat son of Adlai was in charge of the herds in the valleys.
korean_text: 사론 사람 시드래는 사론에서 먹이는 소 떼를 맡았고 아들래의 아들 사밧은 골짜기에 있는 소 떼를 맡았고

sentences.original_text: Shitrai the Sharonite was in charge
of the herds grazing in Sharon
Shaphat son of Adlai was in charge
of the herds in the valleys
